title: Fit
text: ### Get fit and lose weight with two fantastic cardio-style dance themed workouts per month.

title: Food
text: ### Enjoy 3 amazing meals a day, plus snacks, along with meat-free Mondays, wheat-free Wednesdays and Friday night faves, guilt free!

title: Mind
text: ### Meditations and affirmations to help you breathe deeper, sleep more and feel recharged.
